form.retry_hint: Automatically retry failed backups. Backups can fail due to network failures, storage issues or temporary database unavailability.
form.max_failed_tries_hint: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed backups. You will receive a notification when all tries have failed.
form.cpu_count_hint: Number of CPU cores to use for restore processing. Higher values may speed up restores, but use more resources.
form.store_period_hint: How long to keep the backups? Make sure you have enough storage space.

modal.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?

message.storage_change_warning: If you change the storage, all backups in this storage will be deleted.
message.disable_confirm: All current backups will be removed? Are you sure?
message.disable_action: Yes, disable backing up and remove all existing backup files
message.used_by_databases: This backup is used by some databases. Please remove the backup from databases first.
